_comments.discord_webhook_url: Get this from Discord: Server Settings > Integrations > Webhooks > New Webhook
_comments.keywords: Add all terms you want to monitor. Case-insensitive matching.

filters.max_price: Set a number to only get deals under that price (or null for no limit)
filters.min_discount_percent: Minimum discount percentage to notify (or null for no minimum)

discord_control.enabled: Set true to allow receiving commands from a Discord bot in a control channel (webhooks cannot receive messages)
discord_control.channel_id: Discord channel ID to read commands from
discord_control.token_env: Environment variable name that stores your bot token (recommended)
discord_control.allowed_user_ids: Optional allowlist of Discord user IDs. Empty = allow anyone in that channel.
discord_control.ack: If true, bot posts a short acknowledgement message back to the control channel

_comments.sources: Add RSS feeds or JSON endpoints. Types: 'rss' or 'json'
